summary: "Law & Order" is an American TV show about police and lawyers, created by Dick Wolf. It aired on NBC from 1990 to 2010 and was revived in 2022. The show is set in New York City and follows two parts: police investigating crimes and lawyers prosecuting suspects. It's based on real news stories but changes details. The show has had many cast changes but some actors, like Sam Waterston, have been there for a long time. "Law & Order" is one of the longest-running TV series in America and has led to other shows, games, and international versions.
title: Law & Order
